text:
Hey there, in the new DM, it’s impossible to call a Custom Module in another Custom Module... OK I understand that with CSS and JS integration, it’s difficult to manage. But it could be a pb.

Here’s an example :
I created a custom banner hero module with background, style, text...
— I would like to insert a custom module “Breadcrumb”
— I also would like to insert a custom module based on HubDB that get some dynamic information

What do you suggest ?
Thanks everyone :slightly_smiling_face:
